Trade/Device Name(s): The Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for The Ischemia Albumin Cobalt Binding Test (ACB®), a colorimetric serum assay for IMA detection using spectrophotometry on clinical chemistry analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro diagnostic test for detecting ischemia modified albumin in human serum, used with ECG and cardiac troponin for short-term risk stratification in patients with chest pain suggestive of cardiac origin.
